name: Pikachu
specialText: Decreases the movement speed of all opponents near the Pokemon for a short time when the Pokemon receives damage. This Ability goes on a cooldown after it's triggered.
basicAttack: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes (slow) opposing Pokemon for a short time when it hits.

skills.name: Thunder Shock
skills.effect: Releases electricity, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect. Also paralyzes (slow) opposing Pokemon for a short time.

skills.name: Electro Ball
skills.effect: Hurls an electric orb, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect. Also paralyzes (slow) opposing Pokemon for a short time.
skills.upgrades: Increases damage dealt by this move.

skills.name: Thunder
skills.effect: Drops wicked thunderbolts, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect.
skills.upgrades: Increases the number of times this move attacks.

skills.name: Electro Web
skills.effect: Attacks and captures opposing Pokemon using an electric net, leaving them unable to move. (roots target)

skills.name: Volt Tackle
skills.effect: Has the user electrify itself and charge ahead, throwing opposing Pokemon. (knocks target up)

skills.name: Thunderbolt
skills.effect: Attacks with a strong electric blast, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act. (stuns hit opponents)

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.effect: Pikachu's Unite Move. Attacks opposing Pokemon near the user with tremendous bolts of lightning. Similar to Feathered Air Strike, but on a smaller radius.
